mapper.select: SELECT * FROM subjects WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND archived = FALSE ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM subjects WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subjects (user_id, name, color_code, description, archived, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{subjects.userId}, #{subjects.name}, #{subjects.colorCode}, #{subjects.description}, FALSE, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE subjects SET name = #{subjects.name}, color_code = #{subjects.colorCode}, description = #{subjects.description}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{subjects.id} AND user_id = #{subjects.userId}
UPDATE subjects SET archived = TRUE, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
